Summary: Moved extremely slow with no noise. Slowly turned to the south.
divs: Sighting DetailsGoing south on Power road towards US 60 I made a right hand turn to merge onto the US 60 going east. As I entered the on ramp and looked up and to the east I noticed what appeared to be an airplane making a landing approach in my direction. It was basically in front of me and to slightly to the right. As I drove down the on-ramp, I rolled my window down and looked out my passenger window and the object was not very far above may car as it made a very slow turn and I could not hear a thing. I turned the radio off as I was looking at the object and rolled the window down and the object never made a noise. I quicly drove to Sossaman the next intersection and you cannot go "right on red" so I had to sit there for a moment and when I found that object again it was considerably further to the south.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around September 5th 2011
